arts.ttl: Four years without a win: All the key stats ahead of Atalanta vs. Milan
arts.sum: By: Oliver Fisher AC Milan and Atalanta will renew hostilities on Tuesday night at the New Balance Arena, in what will be a 149th meeting. Milan and Atalanta have met 148 times in their history across all competitions. Historically, the Rossoneri have the edge with 69 wins against La Dea’s 31, while 48 games have ended in draws.
